system.description:
During a Quick Rest, you can magically bond with 1 Weapon and choose an Elemental or Mystical damage type, this becomes your “Bound Damage”.

While you hold the Bound Weapon, it gains the following properties:

  • Illuminate: You can spend 1 AP to cause it to emit Dim or Bright Light (you choose the light’s appearance) in a 5 Space radius. The light is extinguished if you release the Weapon or choose to do so for free.

  • Smite: When you make a Martial Attack with the Weapon, you can spend 1 or more SP to deal +1 Bound Damage per SP spent (+2 damage per SP spent if it’s a Melee Attack).

  • Recall: While the Weapon is within 20 Spaces, unheld, and unsecured, you can call your Weapon back to you for free, causing it to fly to you. If you don’t have a free hand when you call it, or you choose not to grab it, it falls in your Space at your feet.

Ending Early: Your bond with the Weapon ends early if you use this Feature again or you choose to end it for free.
